abstract: Cathay Pacific ordered 15 Airbus aircraft and 10 Boeings, and will lease two more Airbus jets, as it announced rocketing profits, helped by the resilience of Asian economies.
snippet: Cathay Pacific ordered 15 Airbus aircraft and 10 Boeings, and will lease two more Airbus jets, as it announced rocketing profits, helped by the resilience of Asian economies.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG  Cathay Pacific Airways, one of the biggest carriers serving Asia, on Wednesday announced its second major aircraft order in six months, which comes as it had record earnings and revenue last year.

headline.main: Cathay to Add 27 Jets to Its Fleet as 2010 Profit Soars
headline.print_headline: Cathay to Add 27 Jets to Its Fleet as 2010 Profit Soars
